refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The build operator proceeds through source_array, cell by cell, using the value of expression to compute the value of each cell. The expression argument can be any combination of SciDB functions applied to scalars or SciDB array attributes.

informalexample.para: Build an array of monotonically increasing values:build(<val:double>[i=0:3,4,0,j=0:3,4,0],i*4+j);

To store the result from a build operator, create an array and use the store operator with the build operator.CREATE ARRAY identity_matrix <val:double>[i=0:3,4,0,j=0:3,4,0]; store(build(identity_matrix,iif(i=j,1,0)),identity_matrix);

listitem.para: The build operator can only take arrays with one attribute.
The build operator can only take arrays with bounded dimensions.
